thread.title: Really good!
thread.title_full: Really good! - Review of Sanctuary Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BettyOld
title: Really good!
text:
Very attentive and friendly staff.
Rooms are nice and comfy, super-clean and of a good size.
Breakfast available!
Great location, close to 5th Ave and Rockefeller.
Simply nothing to complain!
Would always go back.
